alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 1:15PM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting 45 to 55 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 35 below zero to 45 below zero. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 2 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. Travel in the backcountry is not advised.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
